title: User Login with Email/Password
want: log in with my email and password
so_that: I can access my account securely
acceptance_criteria: POST /api/auth/login endpoint accepts email and password
Returns JWT token on successful authentication
Returns 401 with error message for invalid credentials
Password is validated against bcrypt hash
Login attempts are rate-limited to 5 per minute

title: OAuth 2.0 Google Login
want: sign up using my Google account
so_that: I can quickly create an account without remembering another password
acceptance_criteria: Callback endpoint exchanges code for tokens
User profile created from Google profile data
Existing users linked by email are logged in
Session JWT issued after successful OAuth flow

title: Login Page UI
want: see a clean login form with email and password fields
so_that: I can easily enter my credentials
acceptance_criteria: Submit button disabled until form is valid
Link to forgot password and sign up

title: OAuth Social Login Buttons
want: see Google and GitHub login buttons on the login page
so_that: I can choose to authenticate with my social accounts
acceptance_criteria: Google sign-in button with official branding
GitHub sign-in button with official branding
Buttons redirect to OAuth authorization URL

title: Process Credit Card Payment
want: pay for my order using a credit card
so_that: I can complete my purchase securely
acceptance_criteria: POST /api/payment/charge accepts card token and amount
Refund endpoint available for failed orders

title: Payment Form with Stripe Elements
want: enter my card details in a secure form
so_that: my payment information is protected
acceptance_criteria: Card brand icon displayed (Visa, Mastercard, etc.)

title: Payment History API
want: retrieve my payment history
so_that: I can track my past transactions
acceptance_criteria: Filter by date range and status
Includes amount, date, status, and receipt URL
Only returns transactions for authenticated user

title: Create User Account
want: create an account with my email and password
so_that: I can access the platform
acceptance_criteria: Password hashed with bcrypt before storage

title: Update User Profile
want: update my profile information
so_that: I can keep my details current
acceptance_criteria: Only authenticated user can update own profile
Validation for field lengths and formats

title: User Profile Page
want: view and edit my profile on a dedicated page
so_that: I can manage my account information
acceptance_criteria: Display current profile data (name, email, avatar)
Edit mode toggle for inline editing

title: Registration Form UI
want: fill out a registration form with validation
so_that: I can create my account correctly
acceptance_criteria: Email, password, confirm password, and name fields

title: List Users (Admin)
want: view a list of all users
so_that: I can manage user accounts
acceptance_criteria: Sort by created_at, name, or email

title: Delete User Account
want: delete my account permanently
so_that: I can remove my data from the platform

title: Email Validation Utility
want: validate email format consistently
so_that: email validation is reusable across the codebase
acceptance_criteria: Function accepts string and returns boolean
Handles null, undefined, empty string gracefully

title: Password Strength Validator
want: check password strength with a utility function
so_that: password policies are enforced consistently
acceptance_criteria: Returns strength score (0-4) and feedback messages
Checks length, uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols

title: Date Formatting Helpers
want: format dates consistently in the UI
so_that: date display is uniform across components
acceptance_criteria: Jest tests for all format options

title: API Error Handler Utility
want: handle API errors consistently
so_that: error handling is standardized across the frontend
acceptance_criteria: Parses error response and extracts message
Maps HTTP status codes to user-friendly messages

title: JWT Token Refresh
want: my session to refresh automatically
so_that: I don't get logged out during active use
acceptance_criteria: Returns new access token and refresh token

title: Navigation Header Component
want: see a navigation header on all pages
so_that: I can easily navigate the application
acceptance_criteria: User avatar dropdown when logged in

title: Toast Notification System
want: see feedback notifications for my actions
so_that: I know when operations succeed or fail
acceptance_criteria: Success, error, warning, and info toast types
